channel.title: people watching on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in people watching on courtside nyc

item.title: tartine
item.description: thoughts sit outside + bottle of wine + people watch andy cohen sighting menu highlights tuna tartare

item.title: cervo's
item.description: thoughts everything is good, not a single miss

item.title: cecchi's
item.description: thoughts when dinner is the night out want to take anyone and everyone i know here menu highlights pork chop cheesecake

item.title: revelie luncheonette
item.description: thoughts would go just to hang with eric again walk-in only menu highlights green chile cheeseburger chopped cheese egg sandwich

item.title: raoul's
item.description: thoughts immaculate vibes fortune teller upstairs ($50 cash only) they hold 8 bar seats for walk-ins menu highlights steak frites - loaded with peppercorns, fantastic brussel sprouts

item.title: felix
item.description: thoughts res was at 1:00pm, didn’t leave until 6:30 chaotic, lit, dancing on tables menu highlights go for the magnum bottles

item.title: casino
item.description: thoughts there’s a cool bar in the basement menu highlights crispy baby artichokes nduja bread

item.title: cafe mogador
item.description: east village williamsburg thoughts east village classic menu highlights amba (side sauce)

item.title: jac's on bond
item.description: thoughts make a res if you can, weeknights better than weekends imo everyone in there is cool and attractive and they know it

item.title: holiday bar
item.description: thoughts interesting concept, menu pulls all the best dishes the owners have had while on “holiday” - i.e. tuna tostada is clearly from contramar, cdmx (but not as good, duh)

item.title: kiki's
item.description: thoughts walk-in only. the restaurant is low-key huge so i’ve never had to wait a long time. also there’s so many cool bars close by for you to go grab a drink while you wait. menu highlights maroulosalata salad zucchini chips grilled octopus mixed grill

item.title: swan room
item.description: thoughts vibes are immaculate. the space is an old converted bank. the ceilings are high and ornate. feels like you’re in a james bond movie.

item.title: the ten bells
item.description: thoughts sneaky huge space in the back for private events or large partiest

item.title: lobby bar hotel chelsea
item.description: thoughts i plan my friend’s visits around going to this bar - always hits. menu highlights ordering the martini is hysterical. they bring out an empty martini glass, a bottle of gin or vodka frozen in a block of ice, fill it to the rim, and give you the vermouth and garnishes on the side.

item.title: le dive
item.description: thoughts the best place to sit outside on a nice day. tables spill into dimes square - outdoor seating + cobblestones feels very european. basement bar where you can dance late nite !

item.title: lola taverna
item.description: thoughts sit curbside with a glass of wine and people watch for hours food is mid, but the vibes are summer

item.title: dante
item.description: thoughts best cocktail bar in new york. menu highlights martini negroni
